author: sky.cactus
content: <@!642887713246150666> It would be great if you could figure out how to get in contact with <@!418000431814279181> and convince them to either add another author (perhaps Tim or someone else who wants to take over ownership) or shepherd the EIP to final (first step is to move it to Review).  Given that they showed up on an ACD call and lobbied for it, I suspect they care enough to do the work but they seem to have disappeared after that call.
